title: Generic_GNN
description: A generic GNN pipeline for rapid prototyping and development

run_type.description: The type of run and pipeline to execute (one of demo, tune, or benchmark

dataset.description: The type of dataset to create and use for the run

logging.description: Whether or not to log info

cuda.description: Whether or not to use a cuda device

directory.description: The directory that stores the datefiles

edge_list_file.description: The name of the edgelist file

node_features_file.description: The name of the node features file

edge_features_file.description: The name of the edge features file

label_file.description: The name of the label file

label_names.description: A list of names (file headers) for labels

visualize.description: Whether or not to visualize the generated graph dataset

semi-supervised.description: Whether or not to operate with a semi-supervised training scheme

dummy_features.description: Whether or not to use dummy edge/node features

weight_classes.description: Whether or not to use weighted classes (for class imbalance)

shuffle.description: Whether or not to shuffle dataset

split_type.description: Type of splitting mechanism to choose

splits.description: A dictionary of key value pairs for split names and float values
